p: The other 32 sequences were obtained from the virus-infected W6/32-bound pool of the HOM-2 cells and thus, these peptides could be presented by HLA-A*03:01 and/or HLA-C*01:02 class I molecules in virus-infected cells. Theoretical binding affinity and allele assignment of these peptides was carried out by IEDB and NetMHCpan bioinformatics tools. 23 and 5 of these VACV sequences were assigned as HLA-A*03:01 and HLA-C*01:02-restricted ligands, respectively ( Table 2). In addition, the other 4 VACV sequences (D6 595-603, D12 99-111, E5 117-127, and E6 72-80) of this peptide pool were assigned as viral ligands with theoretical affinity for both HLA-A*03:01 and -C*01:02 class I molecules ( Table 2).
